name: A cake to grandma's house
description:
Granny is on her 60th birthday and her granddaugther promised her to come and bring the cake. Will she manage to do it?

Keep the promise alive and deliver her so wanted cake.

Controls:

Just click on the buttons on the bottom of the screen to progress on the story or choose what to do.

Assets used:

  • Character Sprites: Assembled from:
    • Cabbit Bases Collection (https://opengameart.org/node/79237)
    • Hair for 24x32 bases (https://opengameart.org/content/hair-for-24x32-bases)
    • Cabbit Collection (https://opengameart.org/node/79804)
  • City Map:
    • LPC Terrain (https://opengameart.org/content/tiled-terrains)
    • LPC Tile Atlas (https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-tile-atlas)
    • LPC Tile Atlas 2 (https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-tile-atlas2)
  • Font:
    • Kenney Fonts (https://opengameart.org/content/kenney-fonts)
  • Cake (https://opengameart.org/content/16x16-pixel-cake)
